modName: Brokefoot Mashup Compilation for non-UNP users
summary: Replaces the esp file in brokefoot\'s compilation to allow anyone to wear the armors, regardless of the currently installed body.
descriptionHtml:
This works with Independent Bodies to allow users of any body to wear brokefoot\'s mashup armors. Wearing them effectively switches your body and textures to UNP no matter what you have installed.

No scripts, spells, or race changing is involved.

Requires brokefoot\'s original mashup compilation: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415
Requires Independent Bodies: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31966

Credits:
This is a modified version of brokefoot\'s original mashup compilation esp.
author: ElfPuncher

files.name: Brokefoot UNP Mashup Compilation for Independent Bodies
